content: Migrated PDF to Template Generation feature to AWS Lambda; Reduced template generation time by more than 50% using multithreading in python.
Written Unit tests for Crove Editor using Cypress.
Implemented Authentication, Redux State Management and React-Navigation in one of the Client's React-Native App.
Contributed to explorer.helium.com during Hacktoberfest and Helium's Open Source Hackathon
Fixed 11 issues related to the user interface of the app
Contributed more than 300 lines of code
Ranked #1 in Helium's Open Source Hackathon.
Developed a Reports management app with React.js and Firebase for a pathology lab in Delhi, India.
The project has helped the lab in generating more than 3000 reports in the last six months.
Generates PDF on client-side only; Reduced pdf generation time up to 40% by utilizing browser's Cache Storage.
